title: PBE Error 500
body:
Me and my friend have both received emails telling us weve been accepted into the PBE but every time we either click the link in the email or try to go through the website drop down we get Error:500, does anyone have a fix for this?

Edit: Downloading and using Hotspot Shield suggested by Targons Blade worked

replies.body:
When I see this issue, it's usually caused by a routing issue to that specific page. It looks like the page is fine on my end, so perhaps a VPN workaround may work. Try using [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) to see if anything has changed. 

Let me know if this worked for you.
Used Cyberghost and it helped me get through, thank you for responding
It got me to the page, but when I click I want to help it just keeps me on the same page with the button.

I'm having the exact same problem!
First I was getting the 500 Error when trying to go throught the e-mail link or through google.
Then I tried Cyberghost and Hotspot Shield and I could get to the page, but when I click "I want to Help!" it just pushes me to the top of the page.
I waited for years to be accepted on the PBE and now that I got access I can't even create an account...

First I thought that the signups were offline because of the pre-season updates but that's clearly not the problem here.
Let me know if you managed to get through please.

Riot Staff we need your help please, save us!

**EDIT:
I finally got it working, I closed my browser and Hotspot Shield, then reopened Hotspot and my browser, went to the link and it was already on the page to create an account.
Not sure if the solution was to close everything and try again or because I logged in on this forum. Or both.**

I tried downloading the Hotspot Shield for Chrome, but im kinda new to it so dont know how it works. I opened the app, and pressed the button in the middle of it, where it says: Press to connect (or something like that) and checked the box: Stay connected on all sites. But its still not working...
I need help;D

I tried using HotSpotShield but it doesn't work for me... Any other ideas? Anyone?

Edit: Also tried Cyberghost...

Same. it still shows the error when having HSP/Cyberghost active..
Also tried clearing browser cashe and using different browser. Didnt work. :(

I got accepted as well and I am experiencing the same issue. I have a support ticket in currently but haven't gotten a reply. I would assume if they sent out a batch of accounts it is overflooded with players trying to create an account causing the error. Once I get a reply from support I will post back.
I am also experiencing this error, was really looking forward to trying out pbe. let me know if it works for you please.
I want to download pbe cuz i heard that there are all champs owned and i have vayne skt t1 skin shard and i want that skin but when i go to that pbe lol link there is still 500 error im so sad
Try using hotspot shield like Targons Blade said, its what worked for me.
